channel.title: Running a server without having the runserver file open?
channel.description: Is it possible? If it is, I'd REALLY like to know how i can get my server to run without having to go through the HUGE lag you get while having runserver open. On the server status page, it says people have .no-ip in their IP address for the server. How do you do that? Someone PLEASE! Help me out here! Desperate!!![br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 08:26:29 PM[/size][hr]BLEH![br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 08:28:56 PM[/size][hr]=o[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 08:30:29 PM[/size][hr]Anyday now...
